channel.title: Npc Location [PI]
channel.description: I am running a PI server and I need to change the shop locations. I went into the spawn.cfg file and changed the coordinates of the shops to where I want then and I compiled the server. I turned the server back on and Giles was not where I put him. I went back into the spawn.cfg and looked at the coordiantes and I teleported to them and it was where I wanted Giles to be so I know that the coordinates are correct. Giles was already spawned and had items in him shop. So all I had to do was change the coordinates, but that did not work. So how can I fix this?

item.title: Npc Location [PI]

item.description:
@akshayp1 wrote:

I was editing the one in the data

@jubagas12345 wrote:

go to data cfg npc’s then open npc file and npc spawn files and change where u want

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Location [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

Okay, what you maybe need to do it spawn-config and find his ID and switch the coords, should look like this…

#'s are Xcoords.
%'s are Ycoords.
*'s is the NPC’s ID.

Hope this helped ya (:…

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Location [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Were you changing the spawn file located in [tt]data.cfg.spawn-config.cfg[/tt] or [tt]bin.spawn-config.cfg[/tt]

Sometimes when you load a project with an IDE and it deletes the bin folder to recompile, it takes everything from all folders and moves it to the bin folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Location [PI]

item.description:
@akshayp1 wrote:

I am running a PI server and I need to change the shop locations. I went into the spawn.cfg file and changed the coordinates of the shops to where I want then and I compiled the server. I turned the server back on and Giles was not where I put him. I went back into the spawn.cfg and looked at the coordiantes and I teleported to them and it was where I wanted Giles to be so I know that the coordinates are correct. Giles was already spawned and had items in him shop. So all I had to do was change the coordinates, but that did not work. So how can I fix this?
